{JSON:MVC} is a JavaScript Framework for Effortless Web Application Modeling

Get Started

The {JSON:MVC} Architecture

Unlimited Options, Unlimited Fun

Effortless application modeling, unconstrained code reuse and harmonious design patterns

Easy

If you know some basic JavaScript you're good to go. No special syntax, no design patterns or other contrived standards.

Empowering

Model your application like clay. Change directions, remove or add features with no penalties or rewrites. It's fast and powerful without you paying a price for it.

Intuitive

Completely logical and approachable. It describes the very nature of data changing through time.

Future Proof

JSONMVC is different. It's complete through its simplicity. It's a timeless, elegant formula. Experience it and you'll never see development the same way again.
